Package coldbox.system.web.context

Class Summary
EventHandlerBean I model a ColdBox event execution
ExceptionBean I model a Coldfusion/Coldbox Exception
InterceptorState I am a pool of interceptors that can execute on a state or interception value
RequestContext The request context object simulates a user request
RequestContextDecorator This is the base request context decorator used as an abstract class for implementing request context decorators
